thread.title: Soboba Casino and The Mariachi Divas are Celebrating Mexican Independence Day 2015!
thread.title_full: Soboba Casino and The Mariachi Divas are Celebrating Mexican Independence Day 2015! - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Soboba Casino and The Mariachi Divas are Celebrating Mexican Independence Day 2015!
text:
Soboba Casino
SAN JACINTO, Calif. , Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Mariachi Divas will be celebrating Mexican Independence Day early this year, hitting the stage at Soboba Casino on Saturday, September 12 at 9 p.m. in the casino's popular AC's Lounge. Tickets are on sale now. The two-time Grammy Award winning Divas, have a grand total of six Grammy award nominations under their belts, and their talent can't be beat. The nominations marked the first time in the history that the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences had an all-female mariachi group as a nominee and a winner. The Mariachi Divas, with their diverse group of all female musicians, are eager to perform, and Soboba Casino is excited to host their next show.
The Diva's extensive discography totals nine albums over the past fifteen years. In addition to playing to audiences in theaters and venues around the country, they are the official mariachi band of Disneyland Resort in Anaheim, California . According to Stan Freese , talent booking director for Disney Resorts, "With their fifth (Grammy) nomination, they have earned more (Grammy) nominations than any other mariachi band."
Soboba Casino's Director of Marketing, Michael J. Broderick stated: "We are very excited to welcome The Mariachi Divas as our guests to the casino. They have amazing talents and we are very pleased to host them." He continued, "It's going to be a great early Mexican Independence Day celebration at Soboba! Viva Mexico !" Doors to the concert will open at 8 p.m. , and the show will start at 9 p.m. Tickets are available now at the Soboba Casino box office.
Soboba Casino is proudly owned and operated by the Soboba Band of Luiseno Indians. Come join us for all the fun and then some! Soboba Casino. Where Everybody Goes to Play! For more information visit: soboba.com
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150908/264478
